attributes.title: Bad
attributes.review: Ever since I downloaded the app I begun having visions of an Oompa Loompa in a suit following me everywhere I go. I tried to stop seeing him but he kept on appearing. It wasn’t until he abducted me that I knew they weren’t visions. He proceeded to feed me only hot Cheetos so I became to look like him. Do not Download this app it’s his way of turning the world into looking orange like him

attributes.title: ✨DO 👏 NOT 👏 GET 👏✨
attributes.review: For  starters this app took two weeks to download and thus far has taken all of my iPhone storage. I opened this app expecting to see the ✨darling✨ man Bernie but instead saw the orange face of a racist, sexist, just straight up nasty person who happens to be the president of our once good country. I would give this app zero stars if i could 🧚‍♂️🧚‍♂️

attributes.title: 🧚🏻‍♀️😹🙈
attributes.review: i cant believe this since when where pigs aloud to get a whole app to themselves like this doesn’t make any sense also this app took 420 days to download and my phone stopped working for 69 days like i can’t believe this also BLACK LIVES MATTER breanna taylor’s murderers still have not been put in jail please go sign her petition ✊🏼✊🏽✊🏿✊🏾

attributes.title: I wish there were negative ratings 😰
attributes.review: This app has deeply scarred me and my homegirls. This app poisoned my water supply,  burned my crops and delivered a plague onto my homes. There is a very odd man who I don’t know featured on this app who honestly represents orange mucus. I don’t understand how this ever was allowed in our good American society to become an app? Sorry to this man, but this app has got to go.

attributes.title: App Crashed
attributes.review: App took 24 hours to download. Then it crashed every time I opened it. The app took my info but then didn’t have any info... every thing was blank. How am I supposed to find out when/where the next event is. I wanted to love it but I had to delete it after my phone froze.

attributes.title: This App Is The Worst
attributes.review: As son as I opened this app, a picture of a wrinkly orange Cheeto popped up on my screen. I woke up in the hospital and was told I was lucky because most people who download this app die. My sister downloaded it and died. This app showed me naked pictures of the ugliest man alive and I felt violated. Do not get this app it killed my sister and assaulted me with the nude of a fat, orange old man.

attributes.title: This app doesn’t even work
attributes.review: This app opens to a black screen and nothing happens when you press the screen or anything. I’ve tried several times to go to the home screen but it will stay black for 2-3 minutes and then reset my phone. Do not get this app.

attributes.title: app is atrocious
attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app, I was told to go back to my country (even though I’m African American and was born here and am in this country because of slavery).  The app is terrible and gives terrible news and has pictures of the current “president”. In summary, the app is racist and misogynistic and will most likely sexually assault you.

attributes.title: This app needs to go on a diet☺️💗💋 without the t🥰🧚‍♂️💕
attributes.review: DiSgUusTaAngG- this app took 102.5 hours to download and made my phone break. I’ve been through two new phones. I don’t really know what to say at this point except Shawty’s👱‍♀️ like🤤 a🅰️ melody🎶 in⬆️ my🙋‍♀️ head🧠 that I😆 can’t😔 keep✊ out👉 Got me😃 singin🎵 like💕 na✊na✊ na✊ na✊ everyday 📆 it’s like💕 my🙏 ipod📱 stuck💋 on replay🔁, replay🔁-ay-ay-ay

attributes.title: Garbage app
attributes.review: If I could rate it a zero I would.😤 This app took 4 days to download and when it did download it made me go blind. There was flashes on the app without flash warnings. Now I have to type out this review using the voice command. Please delete this app if you already have not. Definitely not worth it. 🧚🏽‍♀️🧚🏽‍♀️🧚🏽‍♀️ thank you
